# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your experience and efficiency. Considering its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. For you, I am offering this exceptional product at a special introductory price of $95. This is an opportunity not only to acquire a high-quality item but also to save compared to the market value. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
